backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, authorization, and per‑user game save states with metadata and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented CRT display and asset‑rendering features with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing each frontend source file’s purpose within the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions establishing retro‑themed light/dark color palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling theme, navigation between screens, and profile setup dialog orchestration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity auth and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to set a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/Brand/Icon.tsx: Icon component rendering items from a sprite sheet via background positioning.
frontend/src/components/Brand/Logo.tsx: Small logo component displaying the generated app logo image at variable sizes.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncIndicat: Indicator showing whether the user is authenticated and save states sync to cloud or local only.
App layout providing header, nav tabs, footer, and wrapping screen content with login and sync indicators.
On‑screen touch controller dispatching custom button events for emulator input.
frontend/src/emulator/EmulatorCore.ts: Basic emulator mock that loads ROMs, renders animated visuals, manages state, and handles input.
frontend/src/emulator/inputMappings.ts: Defines default keyboard-to-button mappings and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/emulator/useEmulator.ts: React hook that initializes the emulator, loads ROMs, and exposes controls and state management.
frontend/src/emulator/useEmulatorInput.t: Hook that binds keyboard and custom events to emulator input handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, status tracking, and identity context management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating game entries and save states via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveStates.ts: Manages save states locally or in the cloud depending on auth status, with create/load/delete operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating the authenticated user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom retro-themed CSS variables for light/dark modes, base styling, and a CRT scanline effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/HelpScreen.tsx: Renders help content including ROM usage disclaimer, loading instructions, control mappings, and save-state explanations.
frontend/src/screens/LibraryScreen.tsx: Displays the user's ROM library with options to load, play, and remove games, using IndexedDB-backed data hooks.
frontend/src/screens/PlayScreen.tsx: Provides the emulator play UI, handling ROM loading, save states, controls, and rendering the emulator canvas.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Shows emulator settings for audio, video scaling, and control configuration with update hooks.
frontend/src/storage/romLibrary.ts: Implements IndexedDB-based storage for ROMs with React Query hooks for listing, reading, saving, and deleting games.
frontend/src/storage/saveStates.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for save states, including create, read, update, and delete operations keyed by id and indexed by gameId.
frontend/src/storage/settings.ts: Provides a React hook for loading, persisting, and updating user settings using localStorage with default values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the overall project state, features, requirements, and image asset needs for the emulator project.
